text.__SUMMARY__:
Lonchocarpus sanctuarii is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Honduras, Mexico and San Salvador.
text.Sources: Nelson, C. (1998). "Lonchocarpus sanctuarii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30703A9571647. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30703A9571647.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
